title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – Kitchens faces impossible expectations; Invisible stars in bad markets; Rookie QB minicamp overreactions; Middlekauff Mailbag
itunes:title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – Kitchens faces impossible expectations; Invisible stars in bad markets; Rookie QB minicamp overreactions; Middlekauff Mailbag
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2. 

In this episode, Middlekauff explains why it will be almost impossible for Freddie Kitchens to live up to expectations in his first year as an NFL coach, why Chandler Jones is invisible in Arizona, despite putting up huge numbers, and why people are severely overreacting to rookie QB minicamp performances. He also answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to www.theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
